verbs.description: hamilton [V: is] stepping into schumacher territory when michael schumacher won his seventh formula one world championship with ferrari in 2004 it looked like a record for the ages lewis hamilton michael schumacher scuderia ferrari mercedes benz nico rosberg ferrari schumacher mercedes hamilton grand prix
